revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_SerpentSpawnGibs'''
(''no parameter'')
Spawn one of each {{Class|SerpentGib1}}, {{Class|SerpentGib2}}, and {{Class|SerpentGib3}}. The gibs will be spawned within 8 map units of the calling actor and one unit from its feet. The gibs will have slight x/y velocities ranging from +- 0-0.125 and a floor clip of 6. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Serpent}} and derived classes.
